item.title: Lessons from a sinking ship
item.description: Letâ€™s play with the Titanic data from Kaggle. In this first (blogged) data project, my goals are to explore the data, engineer some basic features, build a few basic models, and compare their fit. Thus, my overall aim is to get a pipeline running and skip tweaking details (fine-tuning models and features) for now. Preparations: clear workspace, detach packages, prepare custom plotting theme. # clear the workspace. rm(list = ls()) # detach packages to avoid interferences.
